attributes.action: Elect Rita Ora UK Prime Minister! She will never let us down.
attributes.additional_details:
With her dulcet tones, smoldering good looks, and on-point fashion sense, she's exactly the kind of leader this country needs. 

She has the attention of our British youth, and, as set out in her musical manifesto: she will never let us down.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=50GQjUZ4P3M
attributes.background:
The uncertainty of Brexit; David Cameron's resignation; the assured ascent of Boris Johnson; dissent across the Labour Party; Farage's political influence. 

Only one person can save us... singer Rita Ora.

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
